aircraft.value: Banshee Fast - AC-4138-774 at Zone-1 Facility

defect_observed.value: Pressure regulator drift. Malfunction reported by flight crew.

findings.value: Detailed investigation conducted on the defective Bleed Air System component. Analysis of operational data indicated parameter deviation.

corrective_action.value: Implement enhanced testing protocol before component installation

preventive_action.value: Implement quality control check at manufacturing stage

remarks_investigation.value: Comprehensive analysis performed. Root cause identified and verified.

remarks_design.value: Design review completed. No design modification required. Component replacement as per maintenance manual is adequate. Date: 19/12/2023 Authorized Signatory of Design: Gp Capt V.S. Pillai

remarks_quality.value: Dept. Quality assurance review completed. Recommend enhanced incoming inspection criteria for this component type. Date: 20/12/2023 Signature: Dr. A.K. Sharma

remarks_user.value: (Project):(if applicable) Fleet experience reviewed. Similar occurrences noted on other platforms. Support fleet-wide inspection. Date: 22/12/2023 Signature: Eng. K.N. Iyer

remarks_ordaqa.value: (Quality Aspects) From quality standpoint, root cause analysis is thorough. Corrective measures are appropriate. Concur. Date: 23/12/2023 Signature: Wg Cdr D.S. Nair

remarks_cemilac.value: / RCMA (Design Aspects) Design authority review completed. Recommend continued airworthiness monitoring of affected component type. Date: 27/12/2023 Signature: Sqn Ldr V.K. Patel

Part - III: (Defect Details)
a) Defect Category: Minor
b) Defect Observed: Pressure regulator drift. Malfunction reported by flight crew.
Part IV: Investigation: (Details of Examination including previous similar Defects)
a) Root Cause Analysis: Age-related degradation of elastomeric components
b) Findings / Conclusions: Detailed investigation conducted on the defective Bleed Air System component. Analysis of
operational data indicated parameter deviation.
c) Remedial Measures Implement enhanced testing protocol before component installation
i. Corrective Action:
ii. Preventive Action: Implement quality control check at manufacturing stage
d) Attributable Code: M - Other Reasons
